channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adorable puppies that look like polar bears found dumped in carrier bag

item.title: Cop resigns after moonlighting as porn star to pay $500,000 bills

item.title: Shop owner makes 50 citizen’s arrests because shoplifting at his store is so bad

item.title: ‘Mosh pit nappy’ released to help people avoid long queues for the loo at gigs
item.description: It comes after a number of incidents of fans refusing to leave the pit at shows...under any circumstances.

item.title: Builders pour concrete over newly built bus stand and now nobody can use it

item.title: 'Dumb Mistake': Baby Jesus Goes Missing, Reappears With Note At Colorado Nativity Scene
item.description: Police in Fort Collins shared surveillance footage of the suspected Grinch who snatched the figurine from the scene.
